title: ineligible to earn loot
body: riot can you please help i have been ineligeble to earn loot for the past two weeks because i got a chat ban i am considering quitting the game because i cant earn anything everygame it says i am ineligible to earn loot due to previous behavioural restrictions the behavioural restricitions were not previous it was at least a week ago

replies.body:
Heyo! It seems like there might be a bit of confusion as to what the reform period is and what the punishment period is. To clarify the whole concept of loot restrictions, check out the [**Hextech Crafting Restrictions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions) support article.

Let me know if there are any questions!
